content: [re: Madame de Maintenon (Maintenant)] desire as desire to give what one cannot give, pour le pouvoir de donner
the remainder is what you can give (the all is what is taken, the whole of her desire)
figure of circle essential to economics, gift must remain aneconomic

soon as there is law, law of partition (partage) [see p. 80], law as partition (moira), soon as there is nomy—there’s economy (oikonomia) > exchange, circulation, return (retour); figure of circle, amortization
time gives nothing to see, is the element of invisibility
gift interrupts economy, is aneconomic, is the impossible
why desire to interrupt circulation of circle, why desire the gift?
could only be a gift the instant the paradoxical instant tears time apart (what Kierkegaard means when he says decision is madness)
gift interrupts economy, it’s not impossible but the impossible

obsessing over circle encircling us, Heidegger [see OS] on circle, point, as vulgar time; time as circle: one of most powerful, ineluctable representations in history of metaphysics ——can’t exactly escape circle, it’s a feast for thinking, but gift as instant of effraction of circle

oikonomia would always follow the path of Ulysses, return home to part chosen, destiny commanded (moira), the being-next-to-self of the Idea in absolute knowledge as odyssean, nostalgia of reappropriation
relation of gift to “present,” essential knot in interlace of this discourse [GT], in knot of Geflecht of which Heidegger says the circle is perhaps only one figure/particular case
w/ gift, perhaps we will put the name of the name in question
“thinking found its fit only in the disproportion of the impossible.”
gift can’t be content with giving to itself (se donner)?
credit, good faith, we lend each other in conversation; credit/faith as precomprehension that condition “tautology” of gift, and make gift impossible: “one” has to give some “thing” to someone other

circular ring of “giving back (rendre),” circulation of debt not just that of things but values or symbols that are involved there (qui s’y engagent en-gage) [TN footnote on engager & its evocation of pledge]
gift annulled each time there is restitution or countergift
readability of text structured by unreadability of secret, narrator in situation analogous to reader; crypt gives to be read, eternally unreadable

[no depth beyond literary phenomenon] inviolability of secret depends on essential superficiality, bare device of being-two-to-speak (l’être-deux-à-parler), a secret beyond reserve of technique, thing, being, thing thought (same could be said for money)
recognition of the gift annuls it
temporalization of time (memory, present, anticipation, pro, re-tention, imminence of future, “ecstases”) destroys the gift via keeping (la garde), restitution, comprehending in advance

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: forgetting of gift must be far more radical than repression, which always consists of keeping by exchanging places, its operation is systematic or topological
be careful, ethically vigilant re: gift w/out debt, there’s calculation & ruse (economy) even in the unconscious
activate our critical and ethical vigilance
gift does not exist, represent itself
absolute forgetting (oubli absolu) which unbinds (délie) absolutely or infinitely more than excuse, forgiveness, acquittal: certain experience of trace, cinder, ashes
forgetting and gift condition each other (unconditional)

Mallarmé links aesthetics w/ political economy via alchemy: alchemy as precursor to political economy, “null stone, dreaming of gold, once called philosophical [elixir]…foreshadows, in finance, the future credit, preceding capital or reducing it to the humility of money!”
something must come about in an instant, an instant that doesn’t belong to economy of time, time w/out time, a forgetting that forgets, but a forgetting that’s not nothing
beyond a mode of Being, language before linguistics [our obsession here, in GT]
for Heidegger, importance of rethinking time, privileged horizon for reelaboration of Being
counterfeit money: heart of questions of reference and difference
“it gives (ça donne),” not an utterance in propositional structure of Greek-Latin grammar
Heidegger: to look ahead (vorblicken) to the It (Es) which gives (gibt) Being (Sein) & time (Zeit), we try to bring the It and its Being into view, capitalize the “It”, become foresighted
can one ask these questions (i.e. what is a gift?) w/out anticipating a thought?

the es gibt plays (spielt), play of 4’s as play of gift, manifests the unity of time’s 3 dimensions, la donne de ce jeu [relance], & la doña, la femme qui nous a requis depuis l’exergue [Derrida then mentions a fine book, Finas’ Donne, which interlaces all these themes]
Blanchot says, more or less, forgetting is another name for Being
God as the gift giver who knows he is giving: auto-recognition
subject and object are arrested effects of the gift, arrests of the gift; subject as such never gives or receives a gift
“there is gift,” not the same as “the gift exists”  [ontological difference?]
“semantic horizon of anticipation that authorizes….” him [Marcel Mauss] to gather together phenomena of diverse sorts
most serious stake of political economy: certain social classes have more time than others; but time cannot be given, it is certainly not time that they possess
gap (écart) btwn thought, language and desire & philosophy, knowledge and science does not exist, gap btwn gift & economy: resembles an empty word or transcendental illusion
perhaps analogy to Kant’s noumenal & phenomenal will help us
gift beyond responsibility forbids one to forgive those who don’t know how to give?
which law obligates one to answer for, to account for, a gift that calls one beyond all responsibility?

even if gift is a simulacrum, il faut (one must) rendre compte (render an account) of the possibility of this simulacrum, and render account of desire to render account > can’t be done w/out principle of reason (principium reddendae rationis)
Baudelaire: “most irreparable of vices: to do evil out of stupidity.”
to look for (chercher) the impossible is that form of madness
“exhausting faculty” of “nature” given to narrator of “Counterfeit Money” as a “gift”: to look for what cannot be found where & when one is looking for it
looking for “noon,” origin w/out shadow, w/out dialectical negativity, not any madness: sleepwalk in the vicinity of the impossible
the alogos, madness, of rendering account (logos) of the atopos (the gift), desire to think the impossible, to desire, to desire to give the impossible: madness as given & desired forgetting
perhaps, mode of gift, (atopic, utopic) madness of desire to give the impossible, this madness would also be a forgetting, to forget the gift [secret of death]
how could one desire a gift that is non-ambivalent? a gift that would not be pharmakon, poison, that would be good? how does one desire forgetting
is work of mourning still a desire to keep? gift vs. grief, gift as non-work [see FWT p. 78]
is madness the movement of the circle or its excess? besieges reason at its 2 borders (inside & outside)
linked to double bind (stricture, ligature, obligation) > absolve, forget absolutely & forgive by giving (lier et délier absolument)
demand for term & temporization, very structure of the thing, demand for limit, boundary, margin, a demand which dawns in gift-counter-gift
demand of gift/countergift, circulatory differance, requirement of restitution “at term,” delayed “due date,” thing itself demands gift & restitution

la différance, qui n’(est) rien, est (dans) la chose même, elle est (donnée) dans la chose même, elle (est) la chose même, elle, la différance, la chose (même), elle, sans rien d’autre, elle-même, rien [differance, the nothing in the thing-itself]
Mauss, against Marx, must think rationality of credit on basis of gift, not the economism of the reverse
writing not as the external archive of the gift, but tied to the very act of gift, act in sense of archive & performative operation
spirit as gift

madness linked to double bind as the bind & the non-bind or débandade: folie de la garde ou de la capitalisation hypermnésique, et folie de la dépense oublieuse; eats away at language, burns up word or meaning of “gift,” spreads its ashes w/out return; that which does not return to the father

what is the consensus on the basis of which an implicit linguistic contract permits us to understand one another, to credit each other when we speak of gift? what if we renounced this question for a play without postulate/prescription, a certain concept of dissemination?
logic of gift under the regime of to have, to be?give what one possess or what one doesn’t possess?
gift of language said to be natural, maternal
Derrida thinking gift by way of idiomatic expressions: give a class, donner une facilité, donner le change [hunting expression], etc.
the irremediable heterogeneity of the gift
Husserl’s donating intuition (gebende Anschauung): principle of principles
Lacan’s “symbolic order” guards gift against dissemination, against itself

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: transcendental signified or signifier as general equivalent, “transcendental” makes possible every categorial determination, all givens (to be/to have, thing/person)

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: “give time (day, life)” is to give nothing: one sees blurred lines btwn transcendental & conditioned, the fold of undecidability that permits all values to be inverted: to give life is to give death (i.e. strange crossing of idioms: “se donner le mort” means “to take one’s life [in English]”)
pièce & “title” could give the title to any possible discourse on gift, any possible gift
re: Mauss’ The Gift, a mass of prescriptive (ethical, moral, juridical) “il faut”: one must opt for give, for noble expenditure, etc.
mediating desire, measuring morality, mediocrity: who gives themselves the right of right measure? paradoxical hubris of measure [thoughtless to laugh at this position]
anthropologists returning to the good inheritance of primitive societies—nature
equivalence of taken & given is posed, thematized; the exemplarity of God (Maru) giving as much as he takes; tribe restores, restitutes equilibrium by following example
not through w/ this logic, one is never through w/ it
poisoned gifts of intellectual legacies, poison that never fails to call forth a counter-poison presented in guise of counter-gift
event as “first time,” classical question, but event, gift, can’t give evidence of itself, only promise itself
hard to draw line btwn moral duty and moralizing discourse on subject of moral duty [teaching ethics], as well as btwn a scientific task, ethos of science, and morality in general
illusion of ethnographic theory (Lévi-Strauss)—like Freud’s “sexual theory” of children
one must render account of law that dissolves the gift in an Aufklarung of relational logic, that privileges, like Lévi-Strauss, the logic of exchange
the mapped-out signified of structuralism, a complementarity w/out supplement that conditions “exercise of symbolic thinking” > this is the rationality of the principle of reason
language elle vole, elle nous souffle, withdraws (soustrait) the responsibility it seems to inaugurate, this originary supplementarity extends far beyond language in strict sense to all textuality
language as a given for Heidegger is already the dialect (Mundart), idiom is the mother of the tongue
question of the “come” of the “come back” will invaginate, efface, all borders, will redouble endlessly ambivalence of gift as good or bad, gift or poison (Gift-gift)
donner reviendrait à prendre et prendre à donner; this would fold itself over on language/writing beyond logocentric closure
language as a phenomenon of gift-countergift, of giving-taking, of exchange, all difficulties of nomination/writing are difficulties of self-naming, self writing (se nommer, s’écrire)
Derrida reels us in from a temporizing detour
via Mauss, difference btwn true money, non-true money & counterfeit money
division or double engenders many other dehiscences  > virtually to infinity
“Counterfeit Money”: title of all fiction
what is a border (bord) or an approach (aborder) once the indivisibility of the trait is no longer secure (assurée)? gift will always be w/out border
gift overruns border & suspends its relation to border, is beyond transgression
title = proper name of narrative
reader is not deceived [like narrator], experiences a secret w/out depth, a secret w/out secret
overrunning [deborder] the frame, which fixes space & time given: identification of figures (even the figure of metonymy) supposes stable relations btwn part & whole
this is perhaps counterfeit money: this perhaps is the intentional dimension[?], the credit, the act of faith that structures all money
text [“Counterfeit Money”]: a machine for provoking events
a “true” corpus is still, perhaps, counterfeit money, may be ghost or spirit, spirit of body & of capital (title, heading, is capital), no problem of canon if this institution were natural
Montaigne: our soul moves only on credit and faith, bound & constrained, under the authority of their teaching
Baudelaire’s “Counterfeit Money,” its play w/ title, links literature to belief, credit, thus capital, economy, politics
“another border already divided itself in indefinite abyssal supplements”
et nous ne pouvons pas faire autrement que partir des textes, et des textes en tant qu’ils partent (qu’ils se séparent, d’eux-mêmes et de leur origine, de nous) dès le départ [even if we wished to]
no problematic of gift on basis of metaphysics of presence, or sign, signifier, signified, or value > only w/ problematic of trace of text
the supposedly most personal, direct writing, in contact w/ “thing-itself,” is “on credit”
“we are no longer credulous enough to believe that we are setting out from things themselves by avoiding ‘texts’ simply by avoiding quotation or the appearance of ‘commentary’”
writing subject does not have to be giving subject; subject as such: bordered, posed, identified, always calculates, reappropriates surplus-value, circular return, a certain capitalization
despite labor of subject, production of surplus-value, gift takes place where there’s trace, dissemination, in excessive forgetting, forgetful excess of the gift

death: the fact that the gift does not return to the donor; death not a natural accident, can only be thought setting out from (à partir du) the gift > neither death nor immortal life can give anything, only a singular surviving can give, “life” in an “economy of death”
whole economy of narrative [“Counterfeit Money”] proceeds from a remainder, change returned, return of an unproductive expenditure [capitalizes?]
time of woman: woman’s absence [in “Counterfeit Money”] organizing the scene like a clock [?]
“Purloined Letter” & “Counterfeit Money” proceed from surplus-value of remnant or a superfluity of revenue (income or inheritance)

motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

content: [via psychoanalysis] circulation of auto-affective fantasmatics [imaginative incorporation] can either disregard overflowing of pure luxury or recognize in it an essential economic function
literature & its relation to capital, city, polis, transformation of monetary forms [late capitalism] (dematerializaiton of money & all the scenes that depend on it)
annihilation of a remainder, as ashes sometimes testify, can play role of memory, of offering, of sacrifice

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

content: Derrida “apologizes” for long detour, explains that it marks the step of 2 men in “Counterfeit Money,” rhythm of every incalculable scene of the gift
in Mauss, ghost & spirit linked in same time, same scene
reason for non-forgiveness [re: “Counterfeit Money”] convokes a whole philosophy whose high noon (sun w/out shadow) is very elliptical
no gift w/out advent of an event, no event w/out surprise of the gift
through a movement of transference, narrator has affected fabric of relation itself
can one create an event, make a story, w/ a simulacrum, w/ counterfeit money? [Badiou]
narrative gives possibility of impossibility of story as story of gift or forgiveness

one usually believes narrative does not recount itself but an object outside of it; [Derrida considers that] what happens happens to the narrator, as if the narrative condition were the cause of the recounted thing, as if the narrative produced the event it was supposed to report
that which is there to see in the relation is w/held from sight
[re: 2 characters in “Counterfeit Money”] espacement: ils s’éloignent du même pas, mais d’un pas qui aussi doit être tout autre
gift is no longer effect even if there are gift effects (des effets de don)
condition of knowing, desire to know (ēpistemē, historia rerum gestarum) [which Derrida relates to the possibility of narration], gives rise to history itself (res gestae, Geschehen, Geschichte)
do Heidegger and Hegel argue the reverse? [history gives rise to narration?]
one must intend to give a gift, and yet all intentionality threatens the gift w/ self-keeping > intentional freedom & chance must miraculously agree w/ each other [double bind]
the foreseeable, programmed, conditioned, expected, counted on, necessary cannot be a gift or event

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: condition common to gift & event: unconditionality > chance, tukhē, in an instant, disorder, surprise, irruptive, unmotivated, freedom of dice throw, coup de don, obey nothing but disorder, principles w/out principles, not necessary, gratuitous, déchirer la trame
event, gift, must be structured by aleatory, remaining unforeseeable w/out being kept so

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: isn’t counterfeit money the truth of capital? everything that depends on faith & credit?
relation of interval, or the spacing to what is lodged in it to be received

khōra is compared to mother & nurse, not part of oppositional couple, 3rd genus, does not belong to “race of women (genos gynaikōn), mother w/out engendering, not an origin, a before signifying no temporal anteriority [intelligible/sensible looks like father/son couple]
in Baudelaire’s “Counterfeit Money”, “looking for noon at two o’clock,” exhausting faculty of gift
in “Counterfeit Money,” wealth, fortune, is natural, as if nature had decided this belonging to social class
nature as gift vs. nature as given (necessary)
playing w/ fors, fortuna, ferre (fer, ferre; in Greek, pherô) which means to bear, & fero, “I report,” counterfeit money carries us to heart of question of reference & difference,
dematerialization of money [late capitalism], can one quote money? fors, fortuna: Baudelaire reserves status of absolute exception for money (not the gift)
Derrida links pheuin, phusis to donation, thus bringing nature & production together [sometimes opposed]; fortune (fate, chance, fors, luck, fortuity) and necessity are allied
Derrida not too convinced by those who defend anti-Semitism of Celine, Baudelaire; exterminate all the witnesses? there’s no anti-Semitism in that?
Baudelaire’s future: a good sense that will condemn everything except money

Aristotle differentiates tukhē from automaton (chance from human finality), offers example of creditor going to market & getting his debt paid back: pas de don, pas de pardon, everything happens en marchant

social function of beggar, madman: “the pocket of an indispensable internal exclusion,” like structure of pharmakos, incorporation w/out introjection (assimilation), an identity by exclusion, keeps outside w/in, l’exception faite (fors) d’une clôture ou d’un clivage intérieur
capitalize, profit on poverty and beggar index, poverty becomes capitalizable credit [Nietzsche’s slave morality]
Baudelaire: “What do you say to that, citizen Proudhon?”
beggar as profound index of socius, at foundation of social contract
sacrifice (always distinguished from pure gift) expects a surplus-value or at least an amortization, a protection

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: beggars (in their exteriority) can represent absolute demand of the Other, inextuingishable appeal, unquenchable thirst for the gift
laws turn gift into exchange, economy, contractual circulation, (distributive) justice
for Aristotle, happy medium, good measure, megaloprepreia (liberality), giving to common good, better character than the cumin cutter, he who would shave an egg
poor man is third party (allows men to exchange, competition, capitalism) vs. woman [Irigaray]
Derrida effectively reminds us that the characters are before the law in the same way as narration and textual dissemination [literature in general]
re: “Counterfeit Money,” what we’re saying about the (narrated) story also valid for (narrating) narrative > fold back on each other
violence of gift: takes by surprise in such a way as to trap, indebt the receiver, place, hold in a process of circulation, but this violence irreducible whether it repeats or interrupts the circle
or: a surprise surprising enough to be forgotten w/out delay, beyond Being, epekeina tes ousia: secret about which one cannot speak, but can no longer remain silent
link btwn morality & calculation of pleasure equivocates good intentions, precipitates gift towards its end, is its very apocalypse [Hamacher], truth of gift > end of gift
perversity can always secretly corrupt the “donner raison à l’autre”: ratio, logos, is on your side [re: “Counterfeit Money”], what counts, can be counted, you took maximum pleasure
not probing soul of literary character, merely analyzing semantic and intentional possibility of utterances, such as they are readable on surface itself
counterfeiter justifies both sides, leaves the circle, mastery of reappropriation

literature as place of non-place of frame, triptych w/ dislocated frame, 3 + or – excluded 4th, all positions exchangeable to infinity, an ex-propriation that forbids a return to self, most powerful or interesting speculation
readers are at once debtors & creditors, like the narrator, we are the beggar, the 3rd party excluded from the secret of the dual scene
[re: “Counterfeit Money”] only a liar could know whether friend gave real money, that is, a connoisseur of counterfeit money; so narrator believes, credits his friend
Poe: counterfeit the presence of night (non-truth): secret survives in their artificitality

as long as money counts, produces effects, as long as it assures finite possibilities of decision & judgment, it is simply not different from money it counterfeits > a more powerful but not infinitely powerful [?] inscription of effects of reference on truth, convention, dispositifs
two-to-speak: secret of literature & secret of counterfeit money
opposition of conventional to natural is discredited, or, more rigorously, it is limited in its indispensable credit, in the speculation it will always have to authorize
time of story given to the narrator, oriented toward him, not w/out interest
literature desacralizes the world like Abraham’s sacrifice [in the name of a secret w/out content]

several meanings of vous avez raison: 1) animal rationale (logon ekhon) 2) know how to count, account, principle of reason, we are men of knowledge, good narrators 3) our calculation has prevailed, we have controlled (arraisonné) (the other) by reasoning
avoir raison: man of reason/account
[Derrida includes a “yes, yes” w/out elaboration]
infinite secret btwn the 2 [re: “Counterfeit Money”], opening space of absolute heterogeneity, beyond everything they have said to each other, the reason they’ve given each other
conditions of gift/event: outside law, unforseeable, surprise, excess, beyond reason
interruption opens space of absolute heterogeneity—infinite secret
gift is a stranger to morality, to will, perhaps to freedom,
is there a desire to create an event? to give more to live? (the counterfeiter)
only a hypothesis of counterfeit money (incalculable) could make gift possible

limit gets blurred once there’s monetary sign, or simply sign, once there’s differance & credit, family no longer contained > this originary ruin is chance of hospitality—like counterfeit money, chance for gift itself [Aristotle looks for balanced limit, not Derrida]
chremastics vs. economy: 1) chremastics, ovular or seminal capital, “bad infinite” of money, no limit 2) economy, oikos, care for home, hearth, limited to necessary goods
nothing can happen w/out family & w/out economy, but neither can anything happen in family, family in sealed enclosure of absolutely restricted economy, w/out chrematistic vertigo
Heidegger on gift, Heidegger discovers an etymology of khreon that links it to hand, to reaching for, also links it to logos > Derrida wonders about credit cards, coded signatures
Heidegger uses formula “to give what one does not have” (like Lacan)
also to khreon as presencing of what is present (das Anwesen des Anwesenden) (Quote fn. 161)

khrema signals in direction of monetary sign; w/ “Counterfeit Money” we’re at heart of truth w/out truth, law w/out law, duty w/out duty concentrated & lost in enigma of khrē, khrema, khraomai: one must, need, lack, desire, be indigent poor, owe, ought, need, utility, interest, thing, event, fatality, prayer
Derrida reminds us of his perplexity in DIF re: Heidegger’s distinction btwn finding/retaining the word for Being [on way to language]

the Good, in Republic, takes on features of father and of Capital, [Derrida’s fn references Dissemination, on bad faith of fraudulent merchandise, tampering w/ money, & on political economy] whereas Baudelaire is interested in copy of copy, phantasm
that generosity must not be motive of gift is not Kantian [Categorical Imperative] because it concerns a general phusis [Heideggerian], not a naturalness or causality of sensible world
gift must not be generous
“freedom” in Kant’s speculative philosophy [?] can’t be demonstrated, it’s a “letter of credit for the moral law,” an assumption; also that (diabolical) evil can never be a motive
faith/belief (act of faith/credit) given w/ monetary language, practical reason cannot be separated from chremastics as we interpreted it above

Baudelaire affirms the diabolical evil or “bêtise”, satanic cruelty, Kant refuses to acknowledge (excess zeal of a bottomless perversity); Baudelaire: one must always return to de Sade, to natural man, to explain evil
for Baudelaire, the worst evil is the one that doesn’t know it’s evil
truth of gift would be (un)veiled by veil of tears rather than sight
The stupidity of the friend in Counterfeit Money not feeling remorse. (Not worthy of the absolute originary gift nature gave man: authentic money, presence.)
no nature, only effects of nature, nature reconstituted after the fact on basis of simulacrum (i.e. literature), nature lends rather than gives, extends credit
Baudelaire inscribes a naturalization in institution called literature, narrator occupies place of nature; via simulacrum, narrative resembles birth of literature
true, authentic money, nature’s gift of a present
natural debt, debt w/out debt > infinite debt

Icarus racing toward sun [via Baudelaire], sinking (sombre) not toward the bottom (fond) but toward abyss; unable to give his name, how could he ever claim he knows how to give? has no sepulture thus no proper name > the whole story? all of history?

secret of literature has no depth, no interiority, spread on the surface of the page, non-psychological structure, not subjective though responsible for most radical effects of subjectivity, a post card, a bank note, a “letter of credit” [see LOBL p. ~101, & SUBJECTILE]
a gift is not signed, does not calculate w/ a time that would do it justice
